bind.calculate: concat(' Nutrition HIV ', if(not(selected(/data/prev_counseled_topics, 'birthplan')) or /data/prev_counseled_topics = '', ' Birthplan ', ''), if(/data/immediate_danger_sign = 'fv', ' Bednet ', ''), if((int(date(/data/edd) - today()) <= 140 and /data/cur_num_anc < 1) or (/data/num_weeks_last_anc >= 6 and /data/cur_num_anc > 0), ' ANC Visits', ''))

This woman has a danger sign that requires a basic (24 hour) referral. Refer to the clinic immediately. Pregnant woman requires treatment within 24 hours.
This woman may have malaria, this requires a basic (24 hour) referral. Refer to the clinic immediately. Pregnant woman requires treatment within 24 hours.
This woman has a previous danger sign that has not improved. A basic (24 hour) referral is recommended. Pregnant woman requires treatment within 24 hours.
